sentence: (BEGIN VIDEO CLIP) DR. MEHMET OZ (R-PA), SENATORIAL CANDIDATE: I received the letter on your screen, some behalf of President Biden from the White House, requesting that I resign from the president's council on sports, fitness and nutrition.
title: 'Hannity' on Biden and NATO
NATO summit to address Russia’s invasion of Ukraine underway

author: Alex Gangitano
title: Biden has sharp response to reporter: ‘You’re playing a game with me’
